body.name: Eicaus 82'' Tall Phone Tripod with 16.5'' Flexible Gooseneck, Portable Tripod for Cell Phone with Remote and Bag, Overhead Tripod Stand for iPhone 15/14/13/12/11 and Pro Series, Android, Cameras
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Robust Design & Unbeatable Stability】Featuring reinforced legs that extend up to 16 inches, this tripod stand fully extends to hug the ground, resulting in a lower center of gravity for enhanced stability. This enhanced stability, coupled with an increased weight-bearing capacity, renders it impervious to toppling even in winds.

【16.5'' Gooseneck-Expand Your Perspective】Equipped with a 16.5-inch extendable gooseneck, this foldable tripod effortlessly extends from 16.29 to 82 inches. Its flexible 360-degree bendable feature allows the equipment to maneuver freely across various angles and orientations, catering to diverse shooting needs—from precise low-angle shots to aerial views and wide-angle captures.

【Compact Shooting Essential】The portable tripod's folding design allows it to occupy a mere 16 inches of space when stored, making it convenient to store without taking up much room. Its included portable bag is a definite plus, effectively tackling the challenge of carrying gear for photography, live streaming, family portraits, travel shots, and video recording.

【Versatile Phone Clamp & Wireless Remote】Our phone clip can accommodate all iPhones and Android phones ranging from 2.8 to 5.7 inches, even those with protective cases. Additionally, it features a convenient cold shoe mount on the side for attaching supplementary lighting or a microphone, allowing versatile equipment usage. The wireless remote is compatible with both iOS and Android, eliminating the need for any app downloads.

【12 Months Warranty】We offer a one-year warranty covering service support and replacement of product parts, activated upon purchase. Feel free to reach out with any inquiries or suggestions for product, and we'll ensure a satisfactory response. The package includes: 1*62''Phone Tripod, 1*Phone Holder, 1*15''Gooseneck, 1*1/4'' Ball Head, 1*Remote, 1*Carry Bag, 1*User Manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great iPhone tripod with a gooseneck. The gooseneck allows you to bend the phone so you can get the perfect angle. It also comes with a Bluetooth remote, so you can snap photos from further away and not have to actually touch your phone to do so. iPhone holder expands from 2.3” to 5.3 inches so it allows for phones that have extra wide or thick covers. The 15 inch gooseneck allows for getting the perfect angle and the 180° rotation head allows for easy up-and-down motion. It also has nonslip rubber feet to keep the tripod in place, and it fits into a standard screw for cameras and ring lights as well. If you would like to add additional features, it has a quick flip lock that adjust the height easily, and a base backing knob to secure the footing, it also comes in a very nice caring bag to keep all of your pieces together .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and convenient
reviews.reviewText: We are always trying to take family photos and having to prop the phone up on different things to try to set the timer. This little gadget was great. It has a remote that easily paired to my phone and I was able to get everyone in place and snap several photos. It gripped my phone will and was adjustable so many different size phones would work with it. The height is adjustable which was nice and it come apart so you can store and carry it in a small little bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's portable, bendable, sturdy, and easy to carry. I like that it has a remote control, which is easy to use. Good compatibility with my camera/phone.Great value for such a small tripod. Remote control included. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and get the job done!
reviews.reviewText: I Found this with a deal that I couldn’t resist and turned out it’s the best thing. It folded up nicely into a very small stick. Space saving and I love it. My daughter loves to play with the remote control. It works well with Bluetooth. The stick can be unfold and get really high and steady. I like the goose neck which make it very convenient. I’m happy with the product. Buy it and you won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, I'm happy with it.
reviews.reviewText: The tripod is expandable, very stable and flexible. It has a built-in remote control. I didn't expect the phone's support to expand so much, but it does a great job as it also supports widescreen devices well. It has a rotatable head so you can take photos and videos from any angle and height. It's lightweight and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice tripod that works with your phone, camera…
reviews.reviewText: This will be so handy in a lot of cases. I love the clamp that holds my phone, & the bendable rod that you can position in many ways is awesome!!It holds my camera as well & my husband has a leveler that goes on a tripod & it works for it too!It can be adjusted at many different heights which is really nice.The wireless remote is great to have, when taking pictures with yourself in the photo, or if you aren’t standing right by your phone.Great all the way around!I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent tripod, highly recommended!
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased similar phone tripods for my phone before, but nothing has ever felt so sturdy and flexible. It comes in a very sleek looking package. Works perfectly with the GoPro, it's size and weight are no problem, I use it to wrap door handles, door tops, chairs, etc. and it's able to face any challenge.A quality product that is definitely a must buy!
